Package game.graphics

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.graphics.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The main controller for the game. It dictates how elements on the main menu page and on the help page should act.
    Author:
    Andreea

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Room room
      The multiplayer game room
      com.jfoenix.controls.JFXListView roomList
      The visual representation of the list of rooms
      static javafx.animation.AnimationTimer startGameTimer
      The timer that checks if the multiplayer game of your room has started and start your game window when it does

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Runs once when the controller is initialised. Adds event handlers to the sound buttons

      • refreshLobby

        public void refreshLobby​(javafx.scene.layout.VBox vbox,
                         javafx.scene.layout.HBox soundHolder,
                         javafx.scene.control.Label title,
                         com.jfoenix.controls.JFXButton join,
                         com.jfoenix.controls.JFXButton create,
                         com.jfoenix.controls.JFXButton start,
                         com.jfoenix.controls.JFXButton back,
                         com.jfoenix.controls.JFXButton refresh,
                         javafx.scene.control.Label roomsLabel,
                         javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Reloads the lobby page
        Parameters:
        vbox - The holder for all the page content
        soundHolder - The holder for the sound buttons
        title - The page title
        join - The join room button
        create - The create room button
        start - The start game button
        back - The return to the menu button
        refresh - The refresh page button
        roomsLabel - The rooms label
        primaryStage - The application stage

      • updateRoom

        public static void updateRoom()
        Updates the room to the current room of the client
